nodes.bodyText: My understanding is that the status is a generic concept which will most likely also be added to other entities (Tenant, Credentials), right? If so, I wonder if it deserves to be represented by a dedicated class instead of a map. In particular, since the type is defined to allow no additional properties in the API spec ...
I guess this should be JsonInclude.Include.NOT_NULL. AFAIK JsonInclude.Include.NON_EMPTY is used for collections only, isn't it?
